column2: As someone befitting my station I should buy some protection if I want to have any chance of surviving in battle !
It is an Armor I need.
As you visit the armorer's shops of [Root.Capital.GetName] you fancy something that could be worth your while.
I simply must have the best there is, I am a [Root.GetRulerTitle] after all !
Something nice but functional, I have not enough to spend.
I cannot afford something too expensive unfortunatly.

Has NOT attempted to employ an armorsmith in the past 2 months
Decide what type of protection you wish to buy.\nThe §Yfull cost§! of the item you commission will be dependent of your §Yrank§!
